document_data.mainbody:
Historical Treatise of Dragonspear Castle was a book that outlined the history of Dragonspear Castle. It covered the major events of the fortress, from its construction in 1255 DR, to the Second Dragonspear War of 1363 DR.
A copy of this book was owned by a member of the Shining Crusade, who added personal annotations to its pages. The crusader died in a small cave infested with trolls.
